summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and official count slips from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 9, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes specific inmate assignments, notably one inmate assigned to 'HOSP' and another as a 'TWN DRIVER'. The documents are routine prison administrative records from the day of Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate roster lists registration number 76256-054 assigned to 'HOSP' (hospital) on August 9, 2019, which is Jeffrey Epstein's known BOP registration number.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total inmate population and tracking assignments including hospital status.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.
Inmate registration number 76256-054 (Jeffrey Epstein) is listed with an assignment to 'HOSP' (hospital) on the inmate roster.
The total inmate population recorded during the count was 760 inmates, verified as 757.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate counts and assignments.
Another inmate (registration 48816-066) is also listed with a 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' assignment code on the same roster.
